title: New York Pass: Visit up to 80 Attractions, Museums & Tours
description:
Whether you know exactly where you want to visit or you're improvising, The New York Pass offers something just right for you. View masterpieces at world-renowned museums, cruise the Hudson River for spectacular skyline views and snap photos with Lady Liberty. All this while getting VIP entry to top attractions and museums with a single pass.

Your New York adventure just got easier (and less expensive) with the tourist card that offers access to more than 80 total things to do, including, but not limited to, these top attractions, tours, and museums:

  • Statue of Liberty and Ellis Island Immigration Museum (includes ferry and entry)
  • Empire State Building Observatory
  • Top of the Rock Observation Deck
  • American Museum of Natural History
  • Metropolitan Museum of Art (MET)
  • Museum of Modern Art (MoMA)
  • Solomon R. Guggenheim Museum
  • Radio City Music Hall Stage Door Tour
  • Central Park Bike Tours and Rentals
  • The Intrepid Sea, Air & Space Museum
  • Madame Tussauds New York
  • Food on Foot Tours
  • Greenwich Village, Wall Street, Brooklyn Bridge, and Central Park walking tours

There's no way to fit every sight into one visit to the Big Apple, but you have a fighting chance with The New York Pass.
highlights: Admission to more than 80 top attractions, museums & tours
VIP Fast-Track entry at several top attractions
200-page guidebook with area maps & attraction details
7-Day Pass for the 5-Day Pass price when you buy now
inclusions: Admission to more than 80 top attractions, museums, & tours
200-page guidebook offered in English, Italian, Spanish, French, German, and Brazilian Portuguese
knowBeforeYouBook: Children 3 and younger are complimentary at most attractions.
Pass is valid for the number of consecutive calendar days you purchase, beginning on the first day of use.
Advance reservations may be made for tours included on the pass; mention you are a New York Pass holder.
Hours and dates of operation for individual attractions vary.
Get the 7-Day Pass for the 5-Day Price when you buy now, savings reflected in the price above.
